page.title: 05A SCHOOL DAY IN GILLINGHAM
page.content: Most pupils get up soon after seven and put on their uniform,which is a dark blazer or sweater,a white shirt and a tie.After breakfast some pupils watch television before walking to school,which starts at nine.First the register is called,then they have assembly where they sing hymns and say prayers.Then their lessons begin.They have seven in the day,four before dinner and three after.Some lessons are interesting,but many are boring. Most teachers are strict but some are fun.Pupils have a break in the morning and play in a yard.Most pupils usually have dinner in school,either their own food or a school meal,but this summer they all have to go home as their teachers are not supervising them.Most pupils think education is important but many do not like their school day.
